curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 성찰하지 않는 삶은 살 가치가 없다.
curriculum.english: The unexamined life is not worth living.

grammarTip.title: Philosophical Truths
grammarTip.explanation: 추상적인 개념을 정의하거나 삶의 이치를 논할 때 사용하는 문장 구조입니다. 'A is B', 'To do is to be' 등을 사용합니다.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: I think, therefore I am.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 인생이란 당신이 다른 계획을 세우느라 바쁠 때 일어나는 것이다.
curriculum.english: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

chunks.text: when you're busy making other plans

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: To live is to suffer.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Happiness depends upon ourselves.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 우리가 반복적으로 하는 것이 곧 우리 자신이다.
curriculum.english: We are what we repeatedly do.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 인간은 자유롭게 태어났으나 도처에 사슬에 묶여 있다.
curriculum.english: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Know thyself.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 결국, 우리는 잡지 않은 기회들만을 후회한다.
curriculum.english: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: This too shall pass.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Time waits for no one.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Change is the only constant in life.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: The past is a foreign country.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Carpe diem, seize the day.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: History repeats itself.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 날짜를 세지 말고, 하루하루를 의미 있게 만들어라.
curriculum.english: Don't count the days, make the days count.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 잃어버린 시간은 결코 되찾을 수 없다.
curriculum.english: Lost time is never found again.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: The future starts today, not tomorrow.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 유일한 참된 지혜는 당신이 아무것도 모른다는 것을 아는 데 있다.
curriculum.english: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Knowledge is power.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Truth is stranger than fiction.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Ignorance is bliss.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Seek the truth.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 사실은 무시된다고 해서 존재하기를 멈추지 않는다.
curriculum.english: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Question everything.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 교육은 양동이를 채우는 것이 아니라 불을 지피는 것이다.
curriculum.english: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Wisdom begins in wonder.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 미래는 꿈의 아름다움을 믿는 자들의 것이다.
curriculum.english: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

chunks.text: those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 모든 사람이 평화롭게 사는 것을 상상해 보라.
curriculum.english: Imagine all the people living life in peace.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: We are the world.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

chunks.text: A journey of a thousand miles

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Be the change you wish to see in the world.

chunks.text: the change you wish to see

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Keep your face always toward the sunshine.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.korean: 미래를 예측하는 가장 좋은 방법은 미래를 만드는 것이다.
curriculum.english: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

chunks.text: The best way to predict the future

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Hope is a waking dream.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: Dream big and dare to fail.

curriculum.question: Translate
curriculum.english: This is not the end, but a new beginning.
